titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Commercial Telegraphers Union Notes and Correspondence on Negotiations with Western Union WAG.266

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-07-15T15:12-0400

change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

did.unittitle: Commercial Telegraphers Union Notes and Correspondence on Negotiations with Western Union

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes notebooks, contracts, correspondence, and other documents concerning the Commercial Telegraphers Union's negotiations with Western Union in the late 1940s.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Tamiment Library received a donation of the Commercial Telegraphers Union records related to the legal negotiations with Western Union. The provenance of this donation is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.046.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Copyright is assumed to be held by the original creator of individual items in the collection; these items are expected to pass into the public domain 120 years after their creation. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Commercial Telegraphers Union Notes and Correspondence on Negotiations with Western Union; WAG 266; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
